text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for InuYasha‘s body. Draw an oval for his head. Add a line, which will act as the center his head.
Draw InuYasha’s torso and neck. Sketch his sword.
Add guidelines for InuYasha’s arms, legs and facial features.
Outline the shapes of the character’s sleeves, legs and sword handle. Add his eyebrows.
Draw InuYasha’s hands, eyes, sword and clothes.
Add the fingers and toes of the character. Pay particular attention to the shape of his hair, eyes, sword and clothes.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour InuYasha, trying to vary the thickness and Darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
